name: 林正釧
objective: This course provides the principal concepts and fundamental theories of thermodynamics and will cover the basic laws of thermodynamics, the energy analysis in closed systems, the energy interactions between system and environment, and the entropy analysis.
schedule:
週次   單元主題
1. Introduction to Thermodynamics
2-3. Basic concepts and definitions
4-5. Properties of a pure substance
6-7 First law of Thermodynamics
8. Energy analysis of closed systems
9. Midterm Exam
10. Energy analysis of closed systems
11-12. Mass and energy analysis of control volumes
13-14 Second Law of Thermodynamics
15-17. Entropy
18. Final Exam
materials:
上課用書：自編教材
參考書目: 
Cengel, Y. A. and Boles, M. A., Thermodynamics: An Engineering Approach, 8th edition, McGraw-Hill, 2015
consultation: 學生可利用 office hours 或使用 email 聯繫討論。
remarks: 課程為實體教學，倘若受疫情影響，將視情況改為遠距教學 (Microsoft Teams)，並彈性調整課程進度。請參考北科 i 學園公佈事項。
